title: Absolutely Wonderful Cheesy, Creamy Spinach Artichoke Dip

Ingredients.1: 0.5 cup Shamrock Farms® Premium Sour Cream

Ingredients.2: 0.5 cup Shamrock Farms® Heavy Whipping Cream

Ingredients.3: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained

Ingredients.4: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and coarsely chopped

Ingredients.7: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl. Gently fold together until well mixed.

Directions.3: Pour into a greased 8-inch or 9-inch pie plate or baking dish.

Directions.4: Bake in the oven for 25 to 35 minutes, or until slightly browned and bubbly. Toast bread slices in the oven for the last 10 minutes of the baking time.
